casebody.data:
NEVADA SANDCASTLES, LLC, Appellant,
v.
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, f/k/a the Bank of New York as trustee FOR the BENEFIT OF the CERTIFICATEHOLDERS OF the CWALT TRUST, INC. ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2004-18CB MORTGAGE PASS THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2004-18CB, Respondent. No. 74522 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 13, 2018

REVERSED. REMAND.
